name: Electric Scooter
description: Elderly man requires portable electronic scooter due to his legs being weakened  after decades of damage from kidney transport, swelling and also having blood clots.

name: PMD Mobility Scooter
description:
An elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC), Mdm S, is living alone in Ang Mo Kio Ave 4 and requires her daily usage of PMD to be mobile within the community. However, her PMD is wearing down and requires a repair or a replacement. As she has already utilised the SMF funding for her current PMD, she would not be eligible for a 2nd motorized device. 
 
On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking either financial assistance in repairs or donation of a PMD.  
 
If you know of someone who can assist in either, please contact caseworker Anthony at 96546542 or anthony.wang@thkmc.org.sg. We would appreciate if the donor can deliver the item to the client’s place at Blk 257 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 4. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg .

contact.org: THK Cluster Support @ Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Anthony Wang

name: motorize wheelchair
description: Client is an elderly man with diabetes. Due to water retention he is not able to walk very well. His elderly wife is unable to push him on a wheelchair, and he has a frozen shoulder, making it difficult to wheel himself. As such, he would like to request for a motorized wheelchair so he can move around more easily

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Tampines
contact.name: Yvette Lau

name: 4-wheeled Mobility Scooter
description: Elderly grandmother has multiple health issues and is unfit for work. She requires a 4-wheeled Mobility Scooter to get around and is hoping to get a secondhand one in good condition.

name: 4 wheeled Mobility Scooter
description:
Client is a 51yo man who has Parkinson's Disease and recently suffered a stroke. As a result of his medical illnesses, wife is currently the solebreadwinner for the family of 7 (3 children and 2 elderly parents). 
In a bid to alleviate some of wife's burden, client is currently looking for jobs and if successful, would require a 4-wheel mobility scooter to travel to work.

name: Motorised Scooter
description:
Client is a cancer patient and staying alone. Client has some mobility issues. Thus, having a motorised scooter will allow client to go about his daily activities.

Note: Client can only use a motorised scooter that is able to support 100-150kg   in weight.

name: electric wheelchair
description:
client is requesting for an electric wheelchair due to mobility issues.
 

He recently developed a condition where all his bones are fusing together starting with his legs, and requires a wheelchair to get around. As he is losing mobility in his hands as well, an electric wheelchair would be more appropriate.

name: Motorized Wheelchair Needed for Elderly Client!
description: Client is an elderly woman with limited mobility. She is presently residing alone and is dependent on others when she utilizes her manual wheelchair. The motorized wheelchair will help her to regain her personal independence and enable her to fulfil her day-to-day needs and errands with more ease.

name: Assorted Biscuit (Halal Certified)
description: Student Care @ Children's Society is currently in need of 5 tins of halal certified assorted biscuits. Any flavor is welcomed. The items will be delivered to the centre and please contact us for exact date and timing. Thank you.

name: 6 packets of XXXL Mamy Poko Junior Night Pants diapers
description: Client (52/F) is a single mother of 3 children and the sole caregiver of 10/M with chronic special needs and is ADL dependent. While her two older children (26/F and 22/F) are working, they are earning a low income due to difficulties gaining stable employment and low education where their current income is insufficient to support the entire family, and client is unable to work due to 10/M's high care needs. Client is requesting for 6 packets of XXXL Mamy Poko Junior Night Pants diapers for her son to alleviate the family's financial burden.

name: E-Bike
description: A family of 3 with a young child aged 3 requires an e-bike to work as a food delivery person. Currently, they have one e-bike but would require another one so that both husband & wife can work full time.

name: Foldable Bicycle
description: A female young adult living in a rental flat. She has poor family support and is receiving assistance for her finances and emotional needs. Her desire is to minimise expenses and would like to receive a foldable bicycle, so that she can cycle to work and save on transport costs. A donation of this bicycle would be highly appreciated. Thank you.

name: Request for TPG compatible mobile phone for elderly please
description:
Client is a 72 year old elderly who lives in rental housing. She is currently in between job and makes many calls for job search purposes. As a result, she has been topping up approximately $30-$40 a month to her prepaid card which is quite costly to her. She heard about TPG and has signed up for the $10 per month plan in hope to reduce her expenses. 

Her current phone is not TPG compatible. As such, she needs to use the TPG app to make calls, in which she has difficulty accessing which limits her call making.

Client hopes to be able to self-reliant and continue working as she is still in good general health. Hence, she hopes to have a TPG compatible phone which she is unable to afford due to her unemployment and limited savings. Thank you very much for your consideration and attention!

She lost her job and is also not able to continue working to provide for the family. Client is requesting for donations for a mobility scooter (including ramps to install at main door) to allow her to independently travel for her various and regular medical appointments and to purchase her own meals as her children are still schooling and often have difficulties accompanying her or purchase her meals on her behalf. This will also help client to regain some independence and alleviate some of her grief over the many losses she is experiencing.
